about_the_game:
Weaving the Past and Future into a New Musical Realm

The soundtrack features compositions by a trio of acclaimed artists:

Masashi Hamauzu, returning from the original FFXIII, Naoshi Mizuta, known for his work on the FFXI, and Mitsuto Suzuki, celebrated for his contributions to The 3rd Birthday.
